problem.markdown:
1. DC supply __________ be used for the transformer.
() Both Can and Connect () Can (x) Connect
2. Current ratios are in _________ of the voltage ratio.
(x) Inverse ratio () Direct ratio
3. Instrument Transformer are used because
() It is not practicable to connect instruments and meters directly to the lines in high voltage circuits () It is cheap () It provides more safety (x) Both it provides more safety and it is not practicable to connect instruments and meters directly to the lines in high voltage circuits
4. The transformer works on principle of ___________ .
() Both Self-induction and Mutual induction (x) Mutual induction () Self-induction
5. The ratio of secondary induced emf to primary induced emf is known as _________ .
() All () Current ratio (x) Voltage transform ratio () Power ratio
problem.p: 1. DC supply __________ be used for the transformer.
2. Current ratios are in _________ of the voltage ratio.

choicegroup.choice: It is not practicable to connect instruments and meters directly to the lines in high voltage circuits
Both it provides more safety and it is not practicable to connect instruments and meters directly to the lines in high voltage circuits

problem.p: 4. The transformer works on principle of ___________ .
5. The ratio of secondary induced emf to primary induced emf is known as _________ .
